long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Doodle Jump Game is a popular and addictive arcade game that is also available as a Chrome Extension. It can be played for free on the website https://subwaysurfersgame.org/. In "Doodle Jump," players control a cute character called "The Doodler" as it jumps from platform to platform in an endless vertical ascent. The goal is to climb as high as possible while avoiding obstacles and enemies along the way. The game features colorful and whimsical graphics, accompanied by fun sound effects. Players can compete against their own high scores or challenge friends to beat their achievements. With its simple yet challenging gameplay, "Doodle Jump Game" provides hours of entertainment and is suitable for players of all ages.

*Note: We have added "Classroom 6x" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website! https://classroom-6x.org/
